price: 191. Do they attribute as partners to Allâh those who created nothing but they themselves are created?
arabic: أَيُشۡرِكُونَ مَا لَا يَخۡلُقُ شَيۡـٔٗا وَهُمۡ يُخۡلَقُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: ayush'rikūna mā lā yakhluqu shayan wahum yukh'laqūna
